DOC.brief_summary: Determine effect repeat isometric exercise balance , blood pressure , heart rate pulse ox . Another outcome measure mental speed test ( quickly subject process information make decision base upon information ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Isometric Exercises Balance , Heart Rate , Pulse Ox Blood Pressure
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects complete mental speed test undergo Computerized Dynamic Posturography ( CDP ) test use modified Clinical Testing Sensory Integration Balance ( mCTSIB ) protocol : subject require stand hard compliant surface ( 4 '' tall foam cushion know mechanical property ) comfortable posture , foot shoulder width , eye open close , head straight arm side free move , gaze forward , breathe normally . Immediately prior CDP testing , subject heart rate , blood pressure pulse Ox measure . These constitute baseline information . Subjects divide two group : isometric exercise group ( instruct perform specific isometric exercise three time week , next 8 week ) control group ( exercise prescribe ) . The testing procedure indicate followed end 8 week . The mental speed test , CDP testing , heart rate , blood pressure pulse Ox constitute follow-up information .
DOC.criteria: Healthy individual Any pathology prevent subject safely perform isometric exercise ( clinician enrol subject make decision )
